valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 4 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 5 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low southwest Rockall 1019 expected northwest Biscay 1011 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Viking 999 expected Dogger 1004 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, mainly northerly 3 to 5, increasing 5 to 7, perhaps gale 8 later. In east, cyclonic 3 to 5, occasionally 6 later.
Sea state
In west, rough, becoming moderate or rough. in east, mainly moderate.
Weather
In west, squally snow showers. In east, snow showers.
Visibility
In west, good, occasionally very poor. In east, good, occasionally very poor.
